listings.Description of job/activites: The Brand Management Summer Internship is an opportunity to gain experience in marketing with P&G, working on live business problems and contributing to the growth of brands. Interns will work on real business challenges, receive mentoring and training, and may secure a full-time position post-graduation.
listings.Requirements/qualifications: University undergraduates completing their degree between June 2026 - January 2027, preferred UAE Nationals. Evidence of passion and achievements, demonstrated leadership, strong communication, and fluency in English, Arabic is a plus.
